sentences.en: "I didn't mean to upset you," Agnew said in a placating voice.
sentences.cn: 阿格纽用抚慰的语气说：“我不是有意让你不高兴。”

sentences.en: After a pause Alex said sharply: "I'm sorry if I've upset you"
sentences.cn: 歇了一会儿后，亚历克斯毫不客气地说：“要是让你心烦了，那我很抱歉。”

sentences.en: After she died I felt very, very upset.
sentences.cn: 她死后，我感觉非常非常难过。

sentences.en: Don’t do anything that would upset him.
sentences.cn: 别做惹他生气的事情。

sentences.en: Don't upset the piles of sheets under the box.
sentences.cn: 不要把箱子下面那几叠床单弄乱了。

sentences.en: He had every reason to be upset.
sentences.cn: 他完全有理由生气。

sentences.en: He upset a bowl of soup.
sentences.cn: 他打翻了一碗汤。

sentences.en: It wasn't anything serious. A mild stomach upset, that's all.
sentences.cn: 没什么大不了的。只是胃有点不舒服，没别的。

sentences.en: It's easy to get a tummy upset from river water.
sentences.cn: 喝河水很容易闹肚子。

sentences.en: Markets are very sensitive to any upsets in the Japanese economic machine.
sentences.cn: 市场对日本经济机器里的任何混乱都是非常敏感的。

sentences.en: Marta looked upset.
sentences.cn: 玛尔塔看起来很沮丧。

sentences.en: Paul was unwell last night with a stomach upset.
sentences.cn: 保罗昨晚肚子不舒服。

sentences.en: She gets very upset if I exclude her from anything.
sentences.cn: 要是有什么事情我不让她参加，她会非常难过。

sentences.en: She sounded upset when I said you couldn't give her an appointment.
sentences.cn: 我告诉她你不能安排与她会面时，她的声音听上去有些沮丧。

sentences.en: She spoke haltingly of her deep upset and hurt.
sentences.cn: 她吞吞吐吐地诉说自己深深的苦恼及伤痛。

sentences.en: She warned me not to say anything to upset him.
sentences.cn: 她警告我不要说任何让他不高兴的话。

sentences.en: She was deeply upset about the way her father treated her.
sentences.cn: 父亲那样对她，她非常难过。

sentences.en: The chemicals upset the balance of the environment.
sentences.cn: 这些化学品破坏了环境的平衡。

sentences.en: The little man, upset, was lisping badly.
sentences.cn: 那个矮个子因为非常生气，所以说话咬舌咬得很厉害。

sentences.en: The whole incident had upset me and my fiancee terribly.
sentences.cn: 整个事件已使我和我的未婚妻非常烦恼。

sentences.en: They are terribly upset by the break-up of their parents' marriage.
sentences.cn: 父母婚姻破裂让他们极度苦恼。

sentences.en: Whatever you do, don't upset the women.
sentences.cn: 不管你做什么，不要让女士们感到不安。

sentences.en: You looked pretty upset just now.
sentences.cn: 你刚才看上去挺难过的。

sentences.en: You’re not still upset with me, are you?
sentences.cn: 你不是还在生我的气吧？

words.tran_cn: 令人心烦意乱的，令人苦恼的

phrases.tran_cn: n. 肠胃不适，消化不良

trans.tran_cn: 难过的，失望的，沮丧的，（肠胃）不舒服的
trans.tran_en: unhappy and worried because something unpleasant or disappointing has happened
an illness that affects the stomach and makes you feel sick
to push something over without intending to
to change a plan or situation in a way that causes problems

trans.tran_cn: 使心烦意乱，使苦恼，使不适；搅乱；弄翻，倾覆
trans.tran_en: to make someone feel unhappy or worried
